string.text: Help, fellas! Gimme a medkit, my buddy’s dying.
Hold on, let me help my buddy first.
Screw you, you piece of shit.

Thanks for saving my ass. Looks like you’re going to town. Watch out - Red’s people set up an ambush on the street ahead. They tied a wire next to a car - don’t trip over it. Keep to the right side of the street and you’ll pass unharmed.
Who else is in town now?

A whole bunch of people making a hell of a mess. Duty and Freedom both marched to the center of town - must be looking for a path to the center of the Zone. We saw a few choppers, so the military is visiting too. Some stalkers are also in town, but they are coming from the other side, from the center of the Zone.
Our boss and his men dug in inside a house a little ways down the street. They won’t go any further. If you want to get into town, you’ll have to smoke them out of that house.
Thanks for nothing. Beat it before I change my mind and shoot you.
Hurry up, we gotta ditch this place.
